duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and develop the federal sales and business development strategy to secure new government contracts at the Federal, State, and Local levels.
Identify, pursue, and develop new business opportunities within the federal market while meeting and exceeding revenue targets.
Execute marketing programs to generate new business leads within the federal government marketplace.
Build market position by establishing relationships with procurement influential federal staff and partners.
Analyze market trends and identify new opportunities for the company within the federal marketplace.
Maintain knowledge of the company's capabilities and collaborate with the team to meet and exceed sales goals for the Federal Business Unit.
Establish and maintain solid working relationships with technical staff, managers, and peers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field
